thread.title: Amazon, STACK donate $1M to Friends of the Rappahannock
thread.title_full: Amazon, STACK donate $1M to Friends of the Rappahannock

author: CATHY DYSON The Free Lance–Star
title: Amazon, STACK donate $1M to Friends of the Rappahannock
text:
The Friends of the Rappahannock has received its largest donation in its 40-year history — a $1 million corporate gift from two companies associated with the burgeoning data-center industry.
